mapper.select: SELECT CAFE_NAME, CAFE_ADDRESS, CONTACT_NUMBER, to_char(created_datetime, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AS created_datetime FROM T_CAFE WHERE DELETED_YN = 'N'

SELECT CAFE_NAME, CAFE_ADDRESS, CONTACT_NUMBER, MENU_INFO, to_char(created_datetime, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AS created_datetime, creator_id, CASE WHEN to_char(UPDATED_DATETIME, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') IS NULL THEN to_char(created_datetime, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') ELSE to_char(UPDATED_DATETIME, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') END AS UPDATED_DATETIME, UPDATOR_ID, DELETED_YN FROM T_CAFE WHERE DELETED_YN = 'N' AND CAFE_NAME = #{cafeName} AND CAFE_ADDRESS = #{cafeAddress}
SELECT ADDRESS, TO_CHAR(CREATED_DATETIME, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CREATED_DATETIME FROM T_REQUEST WHERE DELETED_YN = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_REQUEST( ADDRESS, CREATED_DATETIME, DELETED_YN ) VALUES( #{address}, SYSDATE, 'N' )
